radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked compression of the inferior vena cava at end expiration; cross-sectional area and anterior-posterior diameter of the IVC decreased from 6 cm² and 21 mm during inspiration to 1.2 cm² and 3 mm during expiration.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Preoperative chest CT scan showed severe pectus deformity with an anterior-posterior intrathoracic distance of 1.2 cm; postoperative scan revealed no IVC compression during maximal expiration and improvement in minimal expiratory thoracic depth from 1.2 cm to 5.7 cm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Anterior-posterior intrathoracic distance of 1.2 cm; pectus severity index calculated at 18.8 (severe).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative scan revealed no IVC compression during maximal expiration and marked improvement in minimal expiratory thoracic depth from 1.2 cm to 5.7 cm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Demonstrated placement of the pectus bar at the inferior sternum.
